channel.title: Registering Server Trouble - Help?
channel.description:
Hey guys I just recently got a base: Devolution v7, for my soon-to-be server and I No-IPed the server and portforwarded it on my router for ports 5555-5555 on UDP and TCP (not Both, but two seperate things). Also I downloaded No-IP DUC and I have that running with my server ip: Devoscapeftw.no-ip.org, and everything seems to be running ok. And the server cmd is running perfectly. But when I go to register the server it still says its offline. Any ideas?
Help appreciated

item.title: Registering Server Trouble - Help?
item.dc:creator: @x_Nick_x x Nick x
item.description:
@x_Nick_x wrote:

Hunter_74:

You don’t need o put your Server Ip in here…

Ok… but can you help???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2009, 07:19:22 pm[/size][hr]NVM I got it fixed. Close this topic please
